creator: lothar@naiads.org
text:
Installed tomcat 4.1.3 and on startup.bat tomcat didn't start at all.
as environment was set correctly and there was no logging or sys.err output i 
wrote a bat file for test purposes (same actions as via catalina.bat except for 
the -verbose and the missing start):
@echo off
set BASEDIR="R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3"
set JAVA_ENDORSED_DIRS="R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3\bin;R:\Development\tomcat-
4.1.3
\common\endorsed"                                                               
     
set CLASSPATH=C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\lib\tools.jar
set _RUNJAVA="C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\java"
set _RUNJAVAW="C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\javaw"
set _RUNJDB="C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\jdb" 
set _RUNJAVAC="C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\javac" 
set CLASSPATH=C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\lib\tools.jar;R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3
\bin\bootstrap.jar                                                              
                
set CATALINA_BASE=R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3
set CATALINA_TMPDIR=R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3\temp
set _EXECJAVA="C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\java"
set MAINCLASS=org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap
set ACTION=start
set SECURITY_POLICY_FILE=
set DEBUG_OPTS=
set JPDA=
set _EXECJAVA=start "Tomcat" "C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\java"
set CMD_LINE_ARGS=

C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\bin\java -verbose -Djava.endorsed.dirs="R:\Development\tomcat-
4.1.3\bin;R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3\common\endorsed" -
classpath "C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\lib\tools.jar;R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3
\bin\bootstrap.jar" -Dcatalina.base="R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3" -
Dcatalina.home="R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3" -
Djava.io.tmpdir="R:\Development\tomcat-4.1.3\temp" 
org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap  start


the output:
[Loaded java.lang.Math from C:\Java\jdk1.3.1
\jre\lib\rt.jar]                                       [Loaded 
java.util.HashMap$HashIterator from C:\Java\jdk1.3.1
\jre\lib\rt.jar]                       count = 0, total = 
1017                                                                            
[Loaded java.util.zip.ZipException from C:\Java\jdk1.3.1
\jre\lib\rt.jar]                           java.util.zip.ZipException: invalid 
CEN header (bad signature)                                             at 
java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native 
Method)                                                       at 
java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>
(ZipFile.java:110)                                                  at 
java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>
(JarFile.java:115)                                                  at 
java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>
(JarFile.java:57)                                                   at 
org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.addRepositoryInternal
(StandardClassLoaderjava:1081)                                                  
                                               at 
org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.<init>
(StandardClassLoader.java:221)             at 
org.apache.catalina.startup.ClassLoaderFactory.createClassLoader
(ClassLoaderFactory.java204)                                                    
                                                   at 
org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.main
(Bootstrap.java:156)                          Bootstrap: Class loader creation 
threw exception                                                   
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: addRepositoryInternal: 
java.util.zip.ZipException: invalid CEN eader (bad 
signature)                                                                      
                at 
org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.addRepositoryInternal
(StandardClassLoaderjava:1109)                                                  
                                               at 
org.apache.catalina.loader.StandardClassLoader.<init>
(StandardClassLoader.java:221)             at 
org.apache.catalina.startup.ClassLoaderFactory.createClassLoader
(ClassLoaderFactory.java204)                                                    
                                                   at 
org.apache.catalina.startup.Bootstrap.main
(Bootstrap.java:156)                          [Loaded java.lang.Shutdown$Lock 
from C:\Java\jdk1.3.1\jre\lib\rt.jar]
If somebody else got that, let me know. It does work for me.
creator: remm@apache.org
